original_title: 40 ans, mes vacances sans mon mari
overview: At 40, the gorgeous Lexi is finding out that it's never too late to surrender yourself to lust and the infinite pleasures of the flesh. Let down by an unfaithful husband, Lexi is treating herself to a well-earned holiday in the sun, and goes to meet up with her old friend Dani at her beautiful villa on the Spanish coast. With this sexually liberated woman at her side and surrounded by numerous lovers, Lexi will have the opportunity to let her innermost urges come to light.
title: My Holidays Without My Husband
